title.rendered: Search Berg Wishes You a Happy New Year!

content.rendered:
2019 was fun—and we at Search Berg can’t wait for the New Year, with its new possibilities and successes. We’d like to wish you a great New Year, and we hope it’s as full of possibilities and opportunities as 2019 was.

2019 was a great year for SEO—and an even better one for Search Berg. At the turn of this decade, we want to extend our gratitude to all the clients who trusted us with their businesses, the vendors who placed their faith in us, our white label partners with their unwavering support, our loyal fans, our affiliates, and the super-skilled battalion at Search Labs who have helped us break yet another record for Search Berg in 2019.

The next decade will be no different: more records will be set and broken and set again, because the future’s looking great for SEO!

Here are some of the great things we did in 2019:

  • 20,000 completed SEO projects
  • 5,064 new content pieces written
  • 2,280 videos and infographics created
  • We were the 2019 winner for Bark’s Certificate of Excellence
  • Hundreds of satisfied clients!

The New Year and the new decade come bearing a lot of promises for our clients worldwide and for us. We are excited to dive right into all that 2020 holds for us: so, thank you for supporting us and stay tuned—we’ll still be around and working when the fireworks begin!
